programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Superfan With Cerebral Palsy Surprised With Magical Night
programme.desc: Darlene, a young superfan with cerebral palsy, becomes Justin's date for one magical night after the team hears her story and learns how much she loves the show.

programme.title: FIXT
programme.sub-title: FIXT: Real Estate Agent Ready To Invest In His Teeth
programme.desc: David suffered from a blood disorder and hasn’t had a full set of teeth since he was 12. Heather struggles with a rare genetic condition that put her in dentures in her 20s. Can the FIXT team write the final chapter in their health journeys?

programme.title: Only In
programme.sub-title: Only In: Homemade CEOs, Recycle Bicycle & Pennsyltucky Whiskey in Harrisburg, PA
programme.desc: Where can you find young entrepreneurs, a nonprofit tune-up shop keeping the community safe and a distillery serving up the spirit of Central Pennsylvania? The same place where genius is grown and savory ice cream is a tradition.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Highway of Horrors: The Shotgun Slayer Manhunt
programme.desc: In 1977, people across Pittsburgh live in fear as a string of brutal killings sends detectives on a chase to catch the shotgun slayer. He invades homes and senselessly attacks with a shotgun, knives and hammers in the dead of night.

programme.title: Power of One
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: News 8 is following the journey of a young York County woman with a stage 4 terminal cancer diagnosis as part of our series, "Power of One".

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It! Sacramento: Eating Like Kings
programme.desc: You can’t have Sacramento without the Kings, and you can’t have the Kings without some seriously delicious grub. Chef Sara Arbabian is up against Chef Greg Desmangles to serve up an upscale take on their favorite courtside dishes.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Miya Marcano Story
programme.desc: When homesick college student Miya Marcano books a flight to south Florida for the weekend, her family is thrilled. But when the plane lands, Miya is nowhere to be found.

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.sub-title: Cheap Date: NOLA Fare and Dancing Flair
programme.desc: Local New Orleans eats, levee tours and Cajun and African drum dancing on two cheap dates in New Orleans.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Florida Fugitive
programme.desc: Weeks after a pregnant woman is shot and killed in Orlando, a shootout between her suspected killer and a police officer sparks a manhunt.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in the ‘Burgh: Volunteer at the PGH Zoo
programme.desc: Ed and Day volunteer at the Pittsburgh Zoo and Aquarium. The guys go behind the scenes and get up close and personal with red pandas, giraffes, and sea lions.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.sub-title: Boston Rob Does Beantown: Fancy in Back Bay
programme.desc: Rob discovers amazing antiques, grills some top-notch steak, tours an animal shelter and serves drinks in one of Boston’s poshest neighborhoods.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Free Spirit : How Art and Mixology Meet Up in Santa Fe
programme.desc: Kate explores gin and rituals with a master distiller, talks art and cocktails with an Indigenous painter, and gets a lesson in moving mixology on George R.R. Martin’s adventure train in the high-desert city of Santa Fe.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: Unity in the Community
programme.desc: Celebrate the stories from across the country of community members uniting to uplift and support each other, from nonprofits to athletic organizations, schools and everyday individuals who change lives every day.

programme.title: Absolutely Albuquerque
programme.sub-title: Absolutely Albuquerque: Flying High and Rocking Out
programme.desc: Don't miss this high-flying adventure, as Amanda meets up with renaissance woman, Leah Black. Together, they soar the skies above ABQ, rock out with the future of music, and make great beer for a good cause.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Adulting is Easy in Allegany County, MD
programme.desc: Stay the night in a historic haunted hotel. Climb aboard the region's only club experience on rails. Sip on an adult milkshake, and pay it forward with good barbecue.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate it, Pittsburgh!: Veggie Lovers
programme.desc: Move over meat-eaters. Chef Elsa Santos and Chef Keyla Nogueira go vegetarian as they bring their native cuisines to the city of bridges.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: A Thirst For Life
programme.desc: Joe Lugosch is a 31-year-old Mainer who is tired of living on the edge and partying too hard. With the help of Kinga, Joe will get a new perspective on the world outside and change his habits for good.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Drug Busts
programme.desc: In these real-life stories of the illicit drug trade, learn how law enforcement beats the smugglers in their high-stakes game of cat and mouse.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Wait, What Happened?: Odd Jobs
programme.desc: Frank Nicotero takes to the streets to ask people about the wildest, wackiest news stories. In "Odd Jobs," contestants learn about a kid-run food truck, a school board member with a special license and a senior citizen that's into heavy work.

programme.title: WGAL Local News
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Get the latest local news and weather from WGAL.

programme.title: Behind the Lens: A Storytellers Project
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Join WGAL News 8's Anne Shannon for "Behind the Lens: A Storytellers Project," where we relive the best of 2024 through the eyes of our award-winning photojournalists.

programme.title: Heroes On Call
programme.sub-title: Heroes On Call: The Forgotten Story of America's First Paramedics
programme.desc: In the 1960s, Americans were dying at shocking rates due to inadequate emergency care. Enter Freedom House Ambulance Service: the first paramedics unit in the U.S., run and staffed by Black men and women. This is the origin story of EMS.

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.sub-title: Unbelievable: Rescues From the Brink
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: The Spark
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: From professional hockey players to award-winning muralists, The Spark highlights the craft, the journey, and the joy. These masters and thought leaders may have made names for themselves on the national stage, but they never forget the city that sparks their inspiration daily

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: On The Job
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Orlando expert, Brendan O'Connor, celebrates the people behind the scenes of the businesses that make Orlando a truly unique place. Join him as he rolls up his sleeves and receives hands on training while spending a day with them, On The Job.

programme.title: Maker Nation
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Maker Nation

programme.title: Matter of Fact
programme.sub-title: Matter of Fact: Epic Road Trip
programme.desc: From Colorado to Maryland, correspondent Jessica Gomez takes Matter of Fact viewers across the U.S. to talk with Americans about what keeps them up at night – and what keeps them going.

programme.title: Escaping The Blade
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Why California's sex traffickers are walking free while victims wait in fear and how organizations are fighting to protect survivors.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Caving Into Fun In Lincoln, NE
programme.desc: Explore a historic cave with timeless messages on its walls. Savor every last crumb of a Cookie Monster waffle. Test your putt-putt skills on a hole designed to get the better of you.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Driven to Kill: The Twisted Plot to Murder a Florida Doctor
programme.desc: In a serene community, a beloved doctor is bludgeoned in her own home. Investigators uncover a conspiracy that rocks the close-knit neighborhood to its core​​.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in the ‘Burgh: Making Moves in McKees Rocks
programme.desc: In McKees Rocks, Ed and Day examine the power of community service. The guys experience what it’s like to be a volunteer firefighter, bread maker, and full-service entertainer.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Stories of phenomenal animals that are changing the way people see the world.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Trying To Become an Ironman
programme.desc: Justin tests his mettle to see if he can compete in the Ironman World Championship. With only seven months to train and no prior experience, can Justin pull off this amazing fitness feat?

programme.title: Power of One
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: News 8 is following the journey of a young York County woman with a stage 4 terminal cancer diagnosis as part of our series, "Power of One".

programme.title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.sub-title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.desc: In the summer of 1980, two men wheeled what looked like an IBM computer into a Lake Tahoe casino. The events that followed rocked the industry, baffled bomb technicians, and changed the lives of a criminal’s and a casino magnate’s family forever.

programme.title: Juvenile Lifers: Road to Redemption
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2019) Juvenile Lifers: Road to Redemption focuses on people who were sentenced to life in prison as juveniles. WGAL News 8's Matt Barcaro examines how these these former offenders are re-entering society and the reaction from victims' families.

programme.title: Human Race by Runner's World
programme.sub-title: Human Race By Runner’s World, Vol 3
programme.desc: Runner-in-Chief, Jeff Dengate, presents stories from around the country of runners using their sport for good.

programme.title: One Pill Can Kill
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Told through the voices of grieving parents, this documentary follows the real and lasting impact of the fentanyl crisis. Capturing the aftermath of sudden loss, the search for answers, and the transformation of grief into public advocacy.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Grandmothers Pinky-Promise to Self Care
programme.desc: Karla, a devoted mother and doting grandmother has had her fair share of obstacles from two bouts of cancer to caring for her husband and daughter. Karla embarks on a much needed day of pampering, seeking solace and self-care.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.
